short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives offmarket Insight about each property.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Display essential property insights with our Google Chrome extension. Get quick and comprehensive details about homes right from your browser.

This extension enables you to:
★ View the assessment value of a home.
★ Check the likelihood of a property being listed.
★ See the proximity to Transit-Oriented Areas (TOA).
★ Know the proximity to Frequent Transit Networks (FTN).
★ Locate the closest bus stop.
★ Determine how good of a deal a property is if it's active.
★ Get an AI estimate of the home value.
★ Identify if the property is a corner lot.
★ Verify if the owner has built equity in the home.
★ Measure how close the property is to the highway.
★ Know the direction the home faces (e.g., west/east or north/south).
★ Send property details to your CRM


Install this extension to streamline your property research and make informed decisions. Enhance your browsing experience with real-time property data and insights.

After installing, please reload all tabs for the extension to take effect. For issues or suggestions, feel free to contact us via email proplens@realsaige.com

Compatible with all major real-estate websites such as followupboss.com, housesigma.com, rew.com, zolo.ca, zoocasa.com, zealty.com, zealty.ca, rew.ca, royallepage.ca, autoprop.com, paragonrels.com, realsaige.com, remax.ca, realtor.ca, redfin.ca, zillow.com, burnaby.ca, vancouver.ca, westvancouver.ca, richmond.ca, coquitlam.ca, portcoquitlam.ca, whistler.ca, dnv.org, langleycity.ca, deltamap.ca, abbotsford.ca, mapleridge.ca, whiterockcity.ca, arcgis.com, chilliwack.com, fvrd.ca, scrd.ca, surrey.ca, squamish.ca, portmoody.ca, mission.ca, newwestcity.ca, thealigngroup.ca, ant many more.
